Detailed Description

Function Documentation

UInt32 BspSafetyOsal_getSafetyMode ( void  )

Get Safety Mode.

This function returns the current safety mode.

Returns
curSafetyMode Current safety Mode.
UInt32 BspSafetyOsal_setSafetyMode ( UInt32  safetyMode)

Switch Safety Mode.

This function switches the safety mode. User should pass the desired safety mode.

Parameters
safetyMode[IN] Safety Mode to be set
Returns
curSafetyMode Safety Mode before switch.
